name: The ZigZag Console Table by Kelly Hoppen
description: Discover the ZigZag Console Table, a pinnacle of design excellence brought to you through the exclusive collaboration of Kelly Hoppen for DAVIDSON. This luxury console table is a testament to the seamless fusion of artistry and craftsmanship. Crafted with a sleek black lacquer finish, the ZigZag Console Table exudes a contemporary elegance. Its distinctive feature lies in the single red lacquered leg, a bold and striking accent that elevates any interior decor. Each leg is meticulously crafted to create a distinctive visual appeal, adding a unique touch to your space. The single red lacquered leg stands as a dramatic focal point, adding a pop of colour and a touch of sophistication. The tabletop boasts a sleek, smooth surface with radiused corners, providing a refined backdrop for your curated decorative objects. The sophisticated high gloss lacquer finish enhances the table's visual appeal, adding a luxurious sheen to the design.
